query:
SELECT 
  ct.id as templateId,
  ct.name as templateName,
  COUNT(cti.id) as itemCount
FROM taskChecklists tc
LEFT JOIN checklistTemplates ct ON tc.templateId = ct.id
LEFT JOIN checklistTemplateItems cti ON ct.id = cti.templateId
WHERE tc.id = 2
GROUP BY ct.id, ct.name
